name: Quantum Trail
description:
Attempt at a game for the Game Jam organized by CStudio on March 31st until April 2nd. The topic of the Game Jam is : Oppositions and Dualities

Game made within 48h using the module Pygame of Python for code and Paint for pixel art.

Synopsis

You are an electron going around in a hardware disk. As a lone electron, you are subject to the wave-particle duality. Of course, the roads in a hardware are full of obstacles that you need to avoid and wild photons that you can absorb to gain energy and transfer your message as far as possible.

For more info, download the .zip file and read the Readme file within.
